Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:


Imprisoner sighed when Savanna jumped off.  -Psycho- he thought to himself.  
Acting his inner monologue comm. unit.

-=Alright, now, Predator, inside group attack, Choran, pick 'em off with your 
weapon.  I'll take them down with mine=-

No response from the others, that was good.

"Fine, if you must know, we are going to the Ark to burn graffiti into it." 
Imprisoner said smuggly, a sonic blaster appearing in his hands.  With the 
flick of a button, he switched the setting from 'Destruction' to 
'Incapacitate'.

(Destruction, as in when fired upon something it does damage, Incapaciate if 
will eventually knock people, distort their thoughts, and cause a bit of pain)

He fired a 'continuous' blast off at the grouped Maximals, Hot Rod, Spitfire, 
and Savanna.

His hands going forward quickly, a grenade launcher appeared in Predator's 
hands.  Taking aim quickly, he fired off a grenade, aimed at a position that 
was three feet behind the Maximals, the grenade going between their legs, 
heading for the intended position.

Choran took a step forward, his hands going forward violently, a heavy laser 
rifle appearing in his hands.  Cocking the weapon, he fired off a laser blast 
at Spitfire's abdomen.
